title: School Leadership Development Based on Self-Determination Theory: Teacher-Student Relationship Strengthening Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in Operating Secondary Education Programs and Understanding of Basic Leadership Theories
context.additional_context: Process for refining leadership skills through interactive simulations recreating real school scenarios in VR environments. Learning teacher-student relationship improvement strategies within a math curriculum context

learning_goals: Participants can identify and apply at least three leadership strategies based on Self-Determination Theory (autonomy, competence, and relatedness) in VR simulations.
Perform dialogue techniques for building teacher-student trust via VR role-play with over 80% accuracy.
Design five psychological support measures for enhancing students' self-regulated learning tailored to actual classroom contexts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
